mapper.select: update INSBAgentDeliveryaddress set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},recipientname = #{recipientname},recipientmobilephone = #{recipientmobilephone},recipientprovince = #{recipientprovince},recipientcity = #{recipientcity},recipientarea = #{recipientarea},recipientaddress = #{recipientaddress},zip = #{zip},agentid = #{agentid},isdefault = #{isdefault} where id = #{id}
update INSBAgentDeliveryaddress set isdefault = #{isdefault} where agentid = #{agentid}
update INSBAgentDeliveryaddress set isdefault = #{isdefault} where id = #{id}
